trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert 32-bit signed integer objects to and from data source control cache duration representations.
ASP.NET data source controls that support caching typically provide a `CacheDuration` property that you can set to the number of seconds that the control caches data.
The value 0 represents "Infinite" in these caching contexts, and the DataSourceCacheDurationConverter class takes care of this explicit conversion.
Page developers do not use the DataSourceCacheDurationConverter class.

Control developers who are developing data source controls that support caching use this type converter along with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute to decorate a property that represents a cache duration setting of a custom data source control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"></xref> class.
Determines whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"></xref> can convert an object in the given source type to an <xref:System.Int32> object.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter> class explicitly handles `string` types.
Otherwise, it calls on its base class, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>, to make the determination.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents a type that the converter converts.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"></xref> instance can convert an object to the given destination type.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter> explicitly handles conversion to `string` and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor> types.
Otherwise, it calls on its base class, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>, to make the determination.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type to which you want to convert.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Converts the specified object to an <xref:System.Int32> object.
The ConvertFrom method converts an <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> string or the string "Infinite" to the value 0.
Other values are handled by the base class, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the culture in which to represent the number.
The object to convert.
An object that represents the converted value.
If <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is passed in the value parameter, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is returned.
Converts the specified object to another type.
The ConvertTo method converts a valid value of 0 to the string "Infinite".
Other values are handled by the base class, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the culture in which to represent the number.
The object to convert.
The type to convert the object to.
An object that represents the converted value.
Returns a collection of standard values for the data type the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"></xref> instance is designed for.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> that contains 0 for cache duration, which represents "Infinite".

Specifies whether the collection of standard values returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues*> method is an exclusive list, using the specified context.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter> class always returns `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> collection returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method is not an exhaustive list of possible values.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter"></xref> object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list, using the specified context.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter> object always returns `true` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method should be called to find a common set of values the converter supports.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
